TopicTitle: What happened to the shuttle challenge?

Articles.Content: A while ago on the forums, there was a very large challenge revolving space-shuttle-style launch vehicles. It was supposed to be updated for 1.2 apparently but that doesn't seem to have occurred, so I'm wondering if there are still plans to continue it? I would ask in the thread for the challenge but I have been unable to find it after searching through several pages of the challenges subforum.

Here i found it !!!

But sadly it is closed

Hi there!  The Shuttle Challenge is still unfortunately closed, and due to a series of unfortunate events I haven't been very prevalent on the forums since November last year.  I had a car accident, and my brother had a horrific motorbike accident shortly afterwards.  That on top of a very busy real life conspired to keep me from re-working the shuttle challenge.

Fear not though - Soontm  the challenge shall be reborn!

SM
Sorry to hear that mullet, Hope all is well now. Please let us know when you get back into KSP, it was a very good idea for a challenge. Perhaps passing it along to another user would be a good idea?

13 hours ago, biomecaman said:

Sorry to hear that mullet, Hope all is well now. Please let us know when you get back into KSP, it was a very good idea for a challenge. Perhaps passing it along to another user would be a good idea?

Thanks!  If I thought I wasn't going to re-open the challenge soontm I would invite another forum member to re-open the challenge.  First via pm invitation, then by tender

SM
